analysis.description:
Relotto.RequestPayment (/unique_contracts/0x9838f8716fd037d2cef3935d900e0de23ce2adad.sol#125-133) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _holder.transfer(balanceOf[_holder] * myAddress.balance / totalSupply) (/unique_contracts/0x9838f8716fd037d2cef3935d900e0de23ce2adad.sol#129-131)
Relotto.decimals should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x9838f8716fd037d2cef3935d900e0de23ce2adad.sol#22-23)
Relotto.transfer (/unique_contracts/0x9838f8716fd037d2cef3935d900e0de23ce2adad.sol#73-78) should be declared external
Relotto.transferFrom (/unique_contracts/0x9838f8716fd037d2cef3935d900e0de23ce2adad.sol#78-86) should be declared external

Relotto.ReNew (/unique_contracts/0x9838f8716fd037d2cef3935d900e0de23ce2adad.sol#133-135) should be declared external
